document_data.name: Hueng
document_data.mainbody: '''Heung''' was a great [[wu jen]] and the master of a school of magic in the town of [[Deikhou]] in [[Laothan]], [[Malatra]], in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In [[1356 DR]], a [[Kuong]] temple [[sohei]] tried to assassinate Hueng. The attempt failed and the assassin died.
